https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/id4G7TcqiZAXPZgjDLqsJNBsON0.jpg Outside of a small village in Japan, a mysterious pond is inhabited by mythic creatures. Their story is of revenge, tragedy, and the power of real love. A classical tale which translates wonderfully to film. Demon Pond
